overview: 2 Full Length Features and a Bonus Disc!  Finally! After all these years, the videos that defined my career have made it to DVD. Join Shayla and I as we play together (and with all the hottest talent of the day) all around the world. Over two years in the making, you'll get to see two best friends enjoy the business like it was meant to be - hot, nasty, and fun! With over 4 hours of orgies and anal, facials and hot lesbian love, behind the scenes and interviews, you'll get to know us like never before!
title: Essentially Juli And Shayla
